sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'reactstrap' function Profile({ user, bg }) { return (

Profile

First Name:

{user.f_name}

Last Name:

{user.l_name}

Phone:

+234 {user.phone}

State of Resident:

{user.user_loc_state}

L.G.A:

{user.loc_lga}

Blood Group:

{bg.bg}{bg.rhd}

Are you a Donor:

{user.donor}
) } export default Profile
